update goods set categoryId = #{categoryid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, colorId = #{colorid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, brandId = #{brandid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sizeId = #{sizeid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, barcode = #{barcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, style = #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, script = #{script,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
